评论详情: The cut is so nice and flattering. It is very comfortable and light, so it is versatile. Not see through at all and quite wrinkle resistant. Would definitely recommend.
So comfortable & flowy. I do not care for dresses, typically, but this one fit the way I prefer (not too tight, at all). Highly recommend!

I purchased this olive green dress for our fall maternity and family photos, and it was absolutely perfect! The color is stunning—rich and vibrant, which looked gorgeous against the autumn backdrop. The fit was so flattering on my growing bump, and it made me feel both comfortable and elegant throughout the shoot.  For reference, I’m 5'4" and 200 lbs, and I got a size L, which fit me perfectly (I was 26 weeks pregnant at the time of the shoot). The material is soft and flowy, so it draped beautifully without feeling tight or restrictive. It was exactly what I needed for both comfort and style.  If you're looking for a dress that’s stylish and versatile enough for special occasions like photoshoots and can also be used with or without a bump, this one is a winner. I couldn’t be happier with how it turned out in our pictures!
Looove this dress! Perfect for a family photos shoot. Flowy and comfy while being flattering
So flattering! Purchased multiple
Loved the dress and fit perfect

This dress would be very flattering if the bodice was constructed correctly. The neckline is slightly different from what is pictured as it is a bit oversized and droopy. The base of the dress fits like a medium (the size I bought) but the bodice fits like a large or even XL. The green color is beautiful and looks true to what is shown in the picture. The material feels and falls nice in the skirt portion of the dress...but the fit is so bad, I would return this if I could.

评论概述: So comfortable and suitable for many occasions!
评论详情: I love the length. I’m 5’7. This color is so pretty!
For just right for what I wanted. The back is low so I'll have to pin down my bra

评论概述: Love the Fit, I’m 34 weeks pregnant & fits!
评论详情: Works well with my baby bump, i sized up 1 size from my regular size (small). The blue is gorgeous, easy to steam wrinkles out of. 5’2, 161 (pregnancy weight),
I don’t usually leave reviews but this one was particularly bad. The top bunches up really bad and makes it look nothing like the picture. The picture doesn’t do justice for how bad it really is.

As a mom of 2, I am extremely self conscious of my body. But this dress shows just enough skin in the right places to make me feel confident! It is gorgeous! True to size in my opinion. I am 5’1” and I didn’t feel like I needed to wear heels to avoid stepping on the dress. The elastic under the bust helped that. Worth the money!

Looks exactly how depicted. It’s light and flows well. It doesn’t magically hide my belly but doesn’t stick to my curves either. The color was perfect and overall a good price for the quality of dress.

I’m 5’7, 140lbs, small chested. I liked the dress but the stitching on the front left side was off and fabric gather appeared slightly longer and less tight then right side. I would’ve kept otherwise. Debating on re-buying and trying again…

评论概述: Dress was perfect for the occasion!
评论详情: I’m 5’8, 190 lbs and ordered a large and this dress was perfect for my photoshoot! We climbed up and down a literal cliff for pictures and it was super lightweight and breathable! Definitely worth the money!
It is cute but was a little big on me personally, kept falling off the shoulders. Material was fine as well
I ordered this dress for my maternity shoot. It was absolutely stunning! I still wear it even after having my baby. The material isn’t super breathable, so it is better suited for fall/winter.

I bought this dress a year ago in the coral like color and loved it so much that I wanted it in black for fall pictures this year. As you can tell by the pictures the seam in the chest goes up way higher now. I thought the dress was sewn like that by mistake so I ordered it again and it was delivered the same way.
I loved this dress! Comfortable, well made! I would order in more colors.
Came exactly as pictured! So comfy and soft! Would buy again!

This is my all time favorite dress that I’ve ever purchased from Amazon. Looks like free people but the price point is much better. Perfect color for spring, summer, and fall. Can be dressed up or dressed down. I’ve worn it to work, bridal shower or even a family bbq. Fabric is soft yet dressy and doesn’t wrinkle. It is not sheer at all and has a nice stretchy band around the rib cage area. Favorite dress ever!
The only reason I am rating this a 4 I just wish it was a bit longer! Overall it’s a beautiful dress, it fit nicely, the fabric was nice texture, it was not transparent at all.

28yr old Female Height: 5’4 Weight: 180lbs Bust: 36DDD Size ordered: L  Sometimes it’s hard for me to find dresses that look nice on me. But it fits great, not too tight, not too big. The sleeves slim down the arms. It’s not alot of extra material that may leave the sleeves looking weird/big like other dresses of this style. The dress is long almost down to my ankles so id suggest wearing heels with it if you’re short. It also was very pleasant when it sat on my chest and didnt make me look as bug as I am, which is hard to find. Also the design is simple and elegant. It isnt too busy looking and the color is beautiful for a spring/summer dress. Lastly, this dress is made of sheet material but has material built in underneath that is not transparent. Therefore this dress is not see through. All in all, it was a great purchase.

I tried this on for my friend to see and she said it would be more appropriate if I was from the 1800s or a member of a very conservative religious group. She mentioned Little House on the Prairie. The dress is nice, but it’s neither casual chic or or dressy. I am not keeping it, as it does absolutely nothing for me.
Super cute and flattering. 9 months pregnant and wore it for my maternity shoot.
Love it! It’s so cute. Went down to my ankles- I’m 5’7”. Also was a little bit of a heavier material.
I loved the lenght im curvey and this dress looked amazing on me had lots of people complement me. My curvey girls this is a must!❤️❤️
Cute and it well

I bought this dress for my son’s graduation party and it was perfect! I received tons of compliments. It’s great for a variety of events. Was cute for the party but casual enough to wear for everyday use. It was super comfy and I felt like it accented my body well even as a larger person. It’s low cut in the front and back so you’ll need a special bra.
This is light enough to wear in the summer but just heavy enough to not blow up if it’s windy!

评论用户: Pink dress, the color it wasn't the one in the picture.
评论详情: The color wasn't the same in the picture.
Kinda runs big but I wore for maternity shoot and the color was great for summer baby boy pics
I really like wearing this dress. It’s more of a modest look. The frills on the sleeves gives it movement. The shape is really nice. You can wear any shoes with this.

This dress was perfect for photos I got done with my son. I’m insecure about my arms and stomach and this dress hid all of that; making everything look flattering and having me feel so beautiful, free and light.
I did end up returning this after buying but only because the chest was to big. There seemed to be to much fabric, so for bigger chested ladies this would be ideal.

The color and fit were good. I’m a 2xl and it fit nicely the only thing that bothered me was the uneven flounce in the chest area. It does look uneven in the photo provided but I didn’t notice when purchased
In the chest are has too much fabric made the dress look very weird other than that it’s a beautiful dress.

Dress was longer than what it looks like on the model, it went down to my ankles...I am 5'4...also the chest area was extremely loose, even after I tighten up the back as much as I could so that it would be more fitting, still didn't help. I am usually a size a L & had sized down to a M. The fit was good everywhere else...just not in the chest area. I am a C cup.

Got this dress for family pictures. Was soooo excited except worried about the fit up top cause it didn't seem consistent. I unfortunately got one that had a huge top portion. I had ordered a small. I'm 5'2" 130 lbs. Fit from waist below was perfect but top portion didn't have the lower cut. Top was probably an XL fit. So baggy... I had to fold the front down and used a safety pin to bring the neck line down more..... It worked okay but I really wish it would have been like other photos I saw. I needed a quick fix so I did that myself.... If it would have had a proper neck line, appropriate fit I would have ordered one in every color.

I’ve never left an Amazon review before. I bought this dress for maternity pictures. I was skeptical because of other reviews but bought it anyway because of the positive ones. First of all, I ordered this dress and received the wrong item entirely. I returned it and ordered it again in 2 colors. The tan or coffee color is not cute. It was also torn at the top of the V, and it was sewn unevenly. The pink one didn’t have these issues, but as you can see, it’s not the most flattering dress. I had to bunch it up under my boobs to make it look right because if I pull it down the bust part is way too long. The hem on the sleeves also looks cheap. The quality of the fabric was not terrible, and it wasn’t super heavy or hot. The waistband was stretchy, but the back was really baggy. I wouldn’t be able to wear a bra at all without it showing in the back. Overall, this dress is horrible for the price.

Get ready to read! I tried taking as many good pics as can so if you’re reading you know what’s up. I’m 5’5 and about 185-190 xl was recommended so that’s what I got in the “olive green”. First of all the olive that is advertised doesn’t match the actual color you get. I don’t think the shade they used looked good with my skin tone. I absolutely loved the length of the xl on me! Went all the way to ground. In the photos you can see my feet with the black dress but not with the green one. BUUUT the width around the under part of your boobs (not really your waist, was a little loose so I ordered a large in black (original color I wanted) and that part fit great! It would have been perfect EXCEPT for the fact it came ripped on the chest part-see photo. Next, the black dress v-neck area was sewn way higher up than the green one! Did not look flattering at all. Also, the back v part of it was more loose than the green one too even tho it was a smaller size! It came down exactly to my ankles->black large. The v part on the back of the green dress wasn’t as “loose” and looked better but for some reason the arm cut out holes felt weird; like they came closer to my armpits and I can’t handle it-the black dress didn’t do this. I needed this dress for a wedding and have unfortunately ran out of time to get another one hoping it’ll work. You take a 50/50 chance if you get a good one. The material kind of reminds me of swimsuit material. This is a great dress tho for a wedding in May! It wasn’t thick and also not super thin.
Fabric feels higher quality than the price would indicate. However I personally felt matronly in this dress.
Wore this dress for Easter! Absolutely stunning! It was a bit long for me even with heals on but I’m 5’1” and ordered a large.
The dress was spot on for color and comfort

This dress is stunning! It is a bit heavy but can be easily tied up with the ropes. Worth every penny and you can where it anywhere! It’s also very comfortable and the fabric is solid. The elastic band isn’t as stretchy but definitely does its job by synching the waist area! The fabric is like a canvas style.
Love the dress! It fits well and is true to size

Ok, the elastic at the chest is just all wrong. I had my daughter who is bustier also try it on to see if it was any more flattering and it was just as horrible! The color was nice. The length was good but there’s no getting past the horrible elastic mishap on the front.
This was so cute for my maternity shoot! Love it 10/10
The flap in the front was extremely unflattering looking like I was a pilgrim

I’m 5’9 and this dress was floor length which impressed me being that I’m tall and typically dresses are short. I would say true to size but if you’re not full on the chest area maybe size down. Mine did keep falling down, but I’m not full up there. Otherwise great fabric, very pretty, received a lot of compliments!

This is a lovely dress, the shade of green is a nice dark emerald (not a bright jewel tone emerald) which is exactly what I wanted. The cut is beautiful, feminine, it is a bit transparent, but only when back lit (so maybe add a slip if you care). My only complaint is that the top of the dress, from the empire waist up, is too large, and obviously since these are one cut and not custom tailored, it’s probably just my body type. But the top droops. I need to decide to either return it, or get it tailored to tighten up the top, there’s at least an inch and a half of slack in the bodice where the shoulders could be brought in front and back, and the dress will still be low cut. So, if you’re a bit smaller on top, just know it might not fit well and you might need to get it tailored. I think it’s probably worth it if you have the time (all my local tailors are booked weeks out) and the funds, unfortunately I wanted to wear this to a wedding coming up in a few weeks and it took over a week for it to ship, and I had no way to know how it would fit until it arrived. I didn’t see any other reviews mention this so I wanted to mention it for any future shoppers. It would still be lovely to have for other future events or dates once tailored.
Used for a maternity shoot!!! Color was the same as the photo. Not red. i’m 5’7 & the length was perfect.

I ordered a large and returned for a medium. The back opening on a large wasn’t tight but the fabric hung weird. A medium fits great. Fabric feels great and the flow is beautiful

评论详情: The material this dress is made out of is awful. Does not allow for clean lines, instead fits like a potato sack. Does not provide any shape for your body. Would not recommend.
I liked the color it was true to picture however the front was cut funny at chest and it was too frumpy/big for me.  Amazon usually gets my size right but this time it was a miss.

I purchased this dress for my baby shower. We did a gender neutral theme, due to also having the gender reveal at the baby shower. I love earth tones, so this color was right in my wheel house. I sized up to fit my growing belly, but this dress did not disappoint. I was able to wear this from five months pregnant all the way up until I was 9 months pregnant. The stretch and fit was the best. I still wear this dress now. It's perfect for a chill day, a day at the beach, or even dressy enough to wear to work. Great purchase!!
Beautiful dress! It’s really good quality
Way too long.

I am 33 weeks pregnant, 5’4” and about 190lbs. I ordered the large and it fit perfectly! It is super flattering and I got so many compliments! I wore this for my baby shower. It was a couple inches long on me so I wore wedges with it and it still went down to my toes, and I liked it that way!
I’m 5 months pregnant, normally an XS. I ordered a S as this is the smallest size they have and it was way too big and baggy and just not flattering in any way.
I’m 175 lbs and 5’7. Got a large and fits perfect. Beautiful color and it has white slip underneath.
This fit perfectly, everyone complimented it!
Although it was very pretty, it was way fo big especially in the chest area

评论概述: Cute if you’re looking for modesty
评论详情: I ordered this because it looked cute on an influencer that I follow. She ordered it in a medium. I am slightly more bustier than her so I got a Large.  I am 5’7”, between a size 12-16, 38C bust. The large fit perfectly and felt a little roomy but I do not think I could have gone down to a medium due to my broad shoulders.  I think it’s a cute print.  However, I’m not keeping it because it looks like a prairie dress or a night gown, and the ruffle just below the waist is sewn at a downward angle & just looks droopy which to me drew the eye to the belly area & suggested a baby bump.  Just not my style.

评论概述: Dress is an imitation of the one in the picture
评论详情: This, like many other clothes on amazon, is an imitation of the dress shown. The fabric itself was good, but it was not sewn the best and also was clearly not the exact dress from the picture. I say this because first of all the dress was sewn a little asymmetrically so that it would hang down more on one side than the other. And as far as the imitated design, the rauching on the front between the breasts was much longer than shown in the picture and looked bad. It lengthed the dress in the chest area which caused the fabric to fold and wrinkle around the boob in a very unflatering way. Because I bought the dress last minute I ended up wearing it anyways but actually wore it BACKWARDS because it somehow looked better that way, and more of the imperfections were on the front.
So flowy, love the color
Pretty great dress for the price. Very comfortable and flattering. Recommend sizing down if your not sure though. I'm typically a medium and ordered a small.

I paid close attention to the size chart, but this dress is not made for every body type. If you’re not tall, slim and busty, this may not be the dress for you. The dress looks great on the model, but I am only 5’4” and this dress looks horrible on me. I love the color.

I just used this dress for my Maternity Pictures at 7 months pregnant and let me just say, I AM IN LOVE! It’s super comfy and fit me perfectly. I’m 5’6, 36F, 230 lbs and it fit me so perfectly and it went all the way to the ground for those wondering how long it is! Couldn’t recommend this enough
Material is really good and thick. Definitely could’ve sized down I’m 7 months pregnant and ordered a Medium but could’ve definitely ordered a Small. Length is perfect.
Center stitch is too long. Dress is not flattering.
There was too much excess fabric around my boobs
I got the sky blue one and the color is absolutely stunning. Feels high quality, and a little bit like a bridesmaid dress but I still love it
Wayy better quality than anticipated. Super comfy not itchy at all. Can be worn with or without a bra. The color is perfect for fall
A nice addition to my client closet for maternity sessions! I purchased several colors and the colors are try to what you see..

Initially when I opened the package, I didn’t think it was going to work for our pictures. My main concern was the color, worrying it was too dark and too close to my skin tone. Once I put it on though, it was great. It can be as modest as you want it to be, or as not. It has strings so you can tie up the back, I however just left it open. I loved this dress and everyone complimented it.

I loved this dress!!! It was very well made and long enough to cover my ankles and not trip on it. I paired the dress with a nude square toed chunky heel. I am 5ft3in at 150 pounds. I got lots of compliments and still wear it all the time!! I wear a medium underwear, size 6 pants/shorts, medium-large shirts and a size 36DD or 34DDD bra. I hope all of this helps those questioning if they should buy this dress bc personally I loved it!
I ordered this dress for my maternity pictures and it did not disappoint! It fit well and was true to size. It looked amazing with our fall maternity shoot.
Not only was the colour perfect for photos, the dress is very comfortable. I’m 5’9, 160lbs, and I could have worn a medium, but this one was a large. I am buying another colour!

It was cute but very big. I went based off the size chart but when it arrived and I tried it on, I could have easily gone down two sizes. It was also very long. I am 5’1 and it went to the floor. Even with 3 inch heels it was a little too long for my liking. Material was great, felt high quality, was a beautiful velvet, just not my style, I ordered the black so it made me feel like I was in choir again lol
Beautiful dress, fit perfectly

I loved this dress so much! Such good material and quality. It was perfect length, not too long - not too short. I’m 5’4 for reference. The back is so so cute! It has a tie string. I 100% recommend this dress! Perfect for fall photos
Great dress True to size and great quality! Perfect for our pictures!
I bought this dress for family pictures. Sadly, I had to return this dress because it didn’t match the picture and I didn’t like how the chest area looked.
Absolutely love this dress. Super flattering with my baby bump and the color was gorgeous

Too large overall. Order down. Long, expect it to drag a bit. Material is thick and not see through
Very cute and comfortable. I was able to size down as stretchy and flowy.

I absolutely love this dress! I first ordered a large based on reviews. I am more bottom heavy than too heavy. I ended up exchanging it for a medium. Fits great!. I want to buy this dress in all the colors!! We are doing family pictures tomorrow and I will be wearing this!
This dress was perfect for our family photos. I ordered a large as that’s what I normally wear, I may could have done the medium! The dress is gorgeous!!

I would of ordered the next size up but the dress wouldn't be here I. Time for my shower. The dress is beautiful, and the length was perfect, just the bust area didn't fit correctly.
Loved this dress!! It is on the bigger side, so i would size down one size. It’s pretty heavy as well. Looks so good on.

This dress was everything I was wanting for our fall family pictures! The fit was perfect, I ordered an XL and it fit perfectly in my chest area given I am a 36 DDD. I’m also 6’2 and it was the perfect length for me ended right at my ankles so there was no drag but also not an awkward length. 10/10 recommend this dress!!

I got the sage green color and it was pretty but the neckline is completely different and ugly. It’s sewn up pretty high compared to the stock pictures. I returned this. I’m also pregnant so sized up to a medium but it was HUGE I’m sure I could’ve gotten an XS

Fabric has enough weight to it so that it doesn’t still to you, wore it to a wedding it is absolutely beautiful. For reference I’m a pretty curvy girl with a big but and it fit beautiful. I’m 5’6 and ordered a xl
